title: SSH Misconfiguration Exploration
description: Participants will use Nmap to discover SSH misconfigurations, granting unauthorized access to retrieve a flag.
hints: Start by scanning the server with Nmap to find open ports.
Look for the SSH service and check its configuration.
Try logging in with the root account using a weak password.
learningObjectives: Understand how Nmap can be used to discover services running on a server.
Identify SSH misconfigurations that can lead to system compromise.
Practice exploiting weak SSH configurations to gain access.
